summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department and the Department of Community Development, making an appropriation from the Neighborhood Improvement fund to aid the improvement of an alley located between 17th Avenue Southwest and 16th Avenue Southwest from Southwest Trenton Street to Southwest Cloverdale Street (Alley in Block 4, Plat of Liberty Division No. 1, et al Project) and authorizing preliminary engineering and the awarding of contracts.
